content: bullerup hat free tutorial at youtube https //youtu be/3g-fmdqvs6e information gauge 17 st pr 10 cm knitted in the round with an aran weight yarn materials size 5 mm or us 8 dpn s or a circular knitting needle using magic loop darning needle 100 grams of rauma vams or 100 grams of rauma finull held double instructions cast on 80 stitches k2 p2 for 30 cm/12 inches decreasing r1 k2 p2tog r2 and 3 k2 p1 r4 k2tog p1 r5 and 6 k1 p1 r7 k2tog r8 k all stitches r9 k2tog pull yarn through remaining stitches weave in ends design by christina birk sørensen - instagram birkoggarnet
